events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been identified as related to a refund request due to incorrect delivery.
Support agent Karen has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I’m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the received item so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 78910, and I’ve attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund and arrange for the wrong item to be returned free of charge.
Thanks for your quick response. I appreciate the refund and return arrangement, that sounds good to me.
The refund has been issued to your original payment method, and return shipping details have been emailed to you.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and that the return process went smoothly.
Yes, I’ve received the refund and sent the item back. Thank you for the excellent support.
Your refund case has been successfully closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We’d appreciate if you could complete a short survey about your support experience.
The customer has completed the survey and rated the support experience as very satisfactory.
This refund case has been archived as all actions have been completed successfully.
